Advanced

iMSminer can be easily interfaced to special-purpose modelling tasks such as deep learning.

Interfacing iMSminer to Deep Learning

  • Download folder provided under Using iMSminer to your Google Drive

  • Open iMSminer_Deep_Learning.ipynb for walkthrough in Google Colab
